'''Paban''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Court of Fontaine: Vasari Passage]], [[Fontaine]].

Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player three [[Teachings of Equity]].

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Paban:''' Moving dramas, tumultuous trials &mdash; The Steambird has it all, today and every day!
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Adventure Challenge
:;(Opens [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Paban/Exclusive Scoop|Genius Invokation TCG match interface]])
:;(If the player loses the match)
:::'''Paban:''' I won! Once I finish planning that huge newspaper distribution deal, you'll be selling papers and making me some Mora, eh?
:;(If the player wins the match)
:::'''Paban:''' Argh! Playing cards is much harder than selling newspapers...
:{{DIcon}} And what's the news?
::'''Paban:''' Interested? Well then, buy the paper!
::'''Paban:''' Of course, if you're too lazy to read, you can also look for [[Sir Arthur]]. It will tell you about the latest news.
::'''Paban:''' But if you're looking for news that isn't reported in the papers, you'll have some trouble finding it.
::{{DIcon}} What sort of news, for example?
:::'''Paban:''' For example... Well, to be honest, I don't know what you'd like to know.
:::'''Paban:''' Could I ask where you're from, and what your vocation might be?
:::'''Paban:''' That way, I might be able to pinpoint the information you're looking for.
:::{{DIcon|Reward}} Something feels wrong...
:::'''Paban:''' Something wrong? I doubt it.
:::'''Paban:''' Only when you let me know what you know can I know what you want to know that you don't know.
:::; (Obtain {{Item|Teachings of Equity|x=3}})
::{{DIcon}} And who's Sir Arthur?
:::'''Paban:''' Ah, and there's something you don't know.
:::'''Paban:''' However, I can give you this information for free &mdash; you can consider it a freebie for a new customer.
:::'''Paban:''' Sir Arthur is the eponymous "Steambird" in The Steambird.
:::'''Paban:''' This gentlebird isn't alive, but he can speak just fine.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Paban:''' Come back any time!
{{Dialogue End}}
